title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1742/95 of 17 July 1995 fixing the coefficients for reducing the compensatory payments granted under Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 in the 1995/96 marketing year in certain regions of the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1742/95 of 17 July 1995 fixing the coefficients for reducing the compensatory payments granted under Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 in the 1995/96 marketing year in certain regions of the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pursuant to Article 3 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92, the compensatory payments for the 1995/96 marketing year shall be multiplied by a coefficient of 0,995 in the case of France.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 181, 1. 7. 1992, p. 12.
(2) OJ No L 158, 8. 7. 1995, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 121, 1. 6. 1995, p. 29.
